about_the_game:
"Été" is a relaxing painting game set in Montréal. It lets you unleash your inner artist by coloring the city and creating artworks. Its original soundtrack was composed by Eric Shaw and brought to life by musicians recorded in the Pixel Audio studio.

Paysages

"Paysages" is the album side with a fuller lively orchestration of each daily song, reminiscent of the midday and afternoon orchestrations heard in game.

It also includes 3 bonus tracks which are heard while painting in the canvas.
